templates.name: Sample BRD Template
templates.description: Starter template demonstrating evidence-aware sections and ordering.

sections.title: Executive Summary
sections.purpose: Summarize the report goals and key recommendations.
sections.prompt: Draft a concise summary using only provided blueprint context. Do not add new facts.

sections.title: Findings
sections.purpose: Detail the core findings with evidence-backed claims.
sections.prompt: Use the retrieval plan to ground claims and include inline citations.
